title: Foundation of Lima
summary: Lima was founded by Spanish conquistador Francisco Pizarro on January 18, 1535.

title: Battle of Hastings
summary: The Battle of Hastings was fought between the Norman-French army of William, the Duke of Normandy, and the English army under King Harold Godwinson.

title: Great Pyramid of Giza
summary: Built around 2560 BC, the Great Pyramid of Giza is the oldest and largest of the pyramids in the Giza pyramid complex.

title: Confucius
summary: Confucius was a Chinese philosopher and politician of the Spring and Autumn period, known for his teachings on ethics, family, and society.

title: Fall of the Berlin Wall
summary: The Berlin Wall, a symbol of the Cold War, fell on November 9, 1989, leading to German reunification.
